scripts.db:migrations:print: tsc scripts/migrations.ts && node scripts/migrations.js && rm scripts/migrations.js
scripts.db:tables:drop:users: wrangler d1 execute glot --local --command "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS users"
scripts.db:tables:drop:snippets: wrangler d1 execute glot --local --command "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS snippets"
scripts.db:tables:drop:files: wrangler d1 execute glot --local --command "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS files"
scripts.db:tables:drop:magic_links: wrangler d1 execute glot --local --command "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS magic_links"
scripts.db:tables:drop:sessions: wrangler d1 execute glot --local --command "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS sessions"
scripts.db:tables:drop:migrations: wrangler d1 execute glot --local --command "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS d1_migrations"
scripts.db:tables:drop:all: npm run db:tables:drop:migrations && npm run db:tables:drop:magic_links && npm run db:tables:drop:sessions && npm run db:tables:drop:files && npm run db:tables:drop:snippets && npm run db:tables:drop:users
scripts.prod:db:tables:drop:users: wrangler d1 execute glot --command "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS users"
scripts.prod:db:tables:drop:snippets: wrangler d1 execute glot --command "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS snippets"
scripts.prod:db:tables:drop:files: wrangler d1 execute glot --command "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS files"
scripts.prod:db:tables:drop:magic_links: wrangler d1 execute glot --command "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS magic_links"
scripts.prod:db:tables:drop:sessions: wrangler d1 execute glot --command "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS sessions"
scripts.prod:db:tables:drop:migrations: wrangler d1 execute glot --command "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS d1_migrations"
scripts.prod:db:tables:drop:all: npm run prod:db:tables:drop:migrations && npm run prod:db:tables:drop:magic_links && npm run prod:db:tables:drop:sessions && npm run prod:db:tables:drop:files && npm run prod:db:tables:drop:snippets && npm run prod:db:tables:drop:users
